Text: Whoa, not a fan of the CANAL+ watermark burned in through the whole movie. That's distracting.

V: 8.5

WTF? This isn't HD! I played it on VLC, it looks like shit! I used Vegas pro 10 to check the resolution, it showed it was 720x400, not 1280x720.

Oh, and the watermark isn't nice.

Overall, I say it's not worth it.
